data.prayer: Over 98.72 percent of the people of Hyderabad are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hyderabad, Sind, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Hyderabad, Sind, Pakistan from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Hyderabad, Sind, Pakistan.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help 346 new simple churches start among the 1,733,000 people in the county of Hyderabad, Sind, Pakistan. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Hyderabad, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bedar (Hindu traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, help the people of Hyderabad, Sind, Pakistan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Hyderabad. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Hyderabad, Sind, Pakistan to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
